channel.title: [Class Suggestion]Werewolf and Big game hunter
channel.description:
Werewolf Alpha(Neutral killer)
Passive Ability: you start of the game as a non-neutral with normal abilities, but you will transform to a werewolf on turns 4, 7, 9, and every turn after becoming a werewolf. Werewolf is occupy immune and has two lives at night.
Night Ability 1: bite a non-neutral to turn him/her into a werewolf. (1) Night Ability 2: kill target player(unlimited)
Big Game Hunter (Neutral Killer Killer) Win Condition: Kill the other Neutral Killer at night(can only spawn with Neutral Killer) Night Ability 1: Last Stand: Kamikaze with the target(Override all immunity)(1) Night Ability 2: choose 1: either hide at night (immune to occupy and death) or identify target neutrals (unlimited)
